excerpt: This vegan pesto pasta is a quick and easy meal that's satisfying and flavorful. The fresh basil and garlic add a delicious herbaceous flavor to the creamy sauce.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente.

While pasta is cooking, make the pesto sauce. Place 2 cups of fresh basil leaves, 1/2 cup of pine nuts, 2 cloves of garlic, 1/4 cup of nutritional yeast, 1/4 tsp of salt, and 1/2 cup of olive oil in a food processor and blend until smooth.
Once pasta is cooked, drain and rinse with cold water. Return pasta to pot and mix in the pesto sauce until well-coated.
Add halved cherry tomatoes and serve immediately.
